settingTab.CustomCiteTextSwitchDescription:
Totally customize the format of citation link. The generated text will directly inserted into your document but not be regarded as anchor text.
⚠️Caution: please make sure that the citation link template contains "...(( {{citeFileID}} '...' ))..."or the generated text will not able to link
The regular expression used to search the link in template is /\(\((.*?)\'(.*?)\'\)\)/g'. Please set your template based on it
